@OppenheimerFilm Another fun fact: Oppy had mathematically surmised that there was a chance that the bomb might "set the world on fire." That the chain reaction wouldn't end and it would keep going, sucking all the oxygen in the world and they went ahead with the test anyway. Good times.

@OppenheimerFilm Hey, Hollywood. Nobody's gonna wanna see a biopic about Oppenheimer. And why release this in the Summer? This sounds like a movie made just for an Oscar.
@OppenheimerFilm "we have no choice" except germany had already surrendered and Japan was basically about to. But yes, its good we murdered those civilian and children.

@OppenheimerFilm I’m intrigued. I worked at Los Alamos sister lab, Sandia Labs in the ABQ for 8 years. It’s primary mission is ensuring the viability of our nuclear weapons stockpile. They make that bomb set off down in White Sands a firecracker. It’s terrifying, but we need those places.

@OppenheimerFilm Got to say, apart from repeating that I will never buy anything from an internet ad, that the film appears to be another step down the path of barely discernable audio subtext toward the denouement of a male kiss. Pass. I understand the *boom* took a lot of CGI work, regardless.

@OppenheimerFilm Definitely going drag my sorry 🫦to Cinemark to watch this movie.  I wasn’t born yet when they dropped the bombs 💣 over Japan.  I would like to see this.  How about you?  Won’t be showing until July 2023.
